name: anxordi
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wa(w0, wxo(w1, w2)), wxo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)))

stmt.origin: 3bitr4i(wa(w0, wxo(w1, w2)), wxo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)), wa(w0, wn(wb(w1, w2))), wn(wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2))))

-| wb(wxo(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)), wn(wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2))))

comment: Conjunction distributes over exclusive-or. In intuitionistic logic this assertion is also true, even though ~ xordi does not necessarily hold, in part because the usual definition of xor is subtly different in intuitionistic logic. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 7-Oct-2018.)
